property.name: Styles
property.description: Type: "Array of NamedStyle", Array of named styles.

methodref.name: ApplyDividerStyles
methodref.description: Add to a specified class border style overrides from another class applied to specified edge (top,left,bottom,right).

methodref.name: BakeToCSS
methodref.description: Create CSS stylesheet from a visual stylesheet, css_format describes the level & features to implement.

methodref.name: CombineStyles
methodref.description: Returns style definition for combination of all styles named in classNames list.

methodref.name: DefinesBaseStyle
methodref.description: Returns true if any custom variants match the passed in style (i.e. even if there is no base type, any custom types will cause true if style h).

methodref.name: DeleteStyle
methodref.description: Delete a Style.

methodref.name: ExpandBoxStyles
methodref.description: Expands 'box' styles based on root style(s) (if borders are defined) - removes borders from the 'base' style, which will only be kept around if it includes non-border properties.

methodref.name: FromCSS
methodref.description: Populate a stylesheet from a CSS definition (uses HTML attributes & format wherever possible).

methodref.name: FromString
methodref.description: Populate a stylesheet from a stylesheet definition.

methodref.name: GetPositionalStyle
methodref.description: Return the best psuedo-style (i.e. alt,first,last varients).

methodref.name: GetPsuedoFlags
methodref.description: Reports bitwise flags for psuedo-style.

methodref.name: GetPsuedoInfo
methodref.description: Get psuedo info for a base class (i.e. all classes defined).

methodref.name: LinkedStyleReset
methodref.description: Force linked styles cache to be invalidated (so that changes to styles are reflected).

methodref.name: LinkedStyleSheet
methodref.description: Convert name into style sheet definition.

methodref.name: MatchPatternCount
methodref.description: Return the number of styles that match a given pattern.

methodref.name: MatchPatternNames
methodref.description: Return a list of style names that match a pattern.

methodref.name: Output
methodref.description: Dump the style sheet list (format specs: $N=name,$B=base name,$P=Psuedo-class).

methodref.name: Resolve
methodref.description: Resolves a style from a name - finds closest match (always returns a valid style).

methodref.name: ResolveExact
methodref.description: Resolves a style from a name - finds exact match, or fails.

methodref.name: ResolveMultiple
methodref.description: Resolves one OR many styles into a single stype element (multiple selector support).

methodref.name: StyleNumber
methodref.description: Get the index of a Style from the name.

methodref.name: ToCSS
methodref.description: Output style sheet to CSS version.

methodref.name: ToReportAliasNames
methodref.description: Converts mapped names back to alias (used for css-name mapping in visual style).

methodref.name: ToRestStyle
methodref.description: Emit stylesheet (matching prefix, ommitted) - to rest output.

methodref.name: ToString
methodref.description: Output a stylesheet definition.

methodref.name: Clone
methodref.description: Create a copy of an object instance.

methodref.name: NewInstance
methodref.description: Create a new object instance of the same type.
